Principle:

For mais and lin, threshold values exist based on Zn EDTA (in mg/kg) which are dependent on pH:
pH < 6.2: 1 mg/kg, pH> 6.2: 2 mg/kg

Source: https://www.arvalis.fr/infos-techniques/carences-en-oligo-elements-reperer-les-situations-risque-grace-lanalyse-de-terre
